name: Undead Tower Defense
description:
Where the player will have to defend the location by placing towers and withstand waves of attacking enemies.
In this 3D game, you will find yourself facing the task of repelling hordes of skeletons and monsters.

Tower Placement: You can build various towers along the enemies' path. Each tower has its own unique characteristics and abilities. Choose wisely to effectively deal with different types of enemies.
Upgrades: After building a tower, you can upgrade it to make it more powerful.
Variety of Enemies: Skeletons and monsters can have different characteristics and vulnerabilities. Some may move quickly, while others have high resistance to damage. Your strategy should take these differences into account.
Difficulty Levels: The game may offer different levels of difficulty.
Resources: Make sure to manage your resources effectively to build and upgrade towers.
Strategy: Build towers in strategic positions on the map. Place them in a way that allows you to control enemy movement efficiently.
